channel.title: Help me with a script?

item.title: Help me with a script?
item.dc:creator: @onizak onizak
item.description:
@onizak wrote:

When you set the xs,ys,xe,ye you are(like r.i.p) basically making a rectangle.to do this select “find window” use on rs window. then select “color picker.” press on the object wanted to be clicked,and enter the color after the “x” and “y” coordinates.obviously you have gotten thus far,so---->take color select and press top left corner of monster or tree or whatever you want to be clicked. nter both numbers that come in the field----> (FindColor(x, y, number1,number2,0,0))-----> first part is done! next do the same-take color select and press bottom right of the object you want to be clicked, enter the numbers in the same fashion…so you should have something like this--------->>>

----> if(FindColor(x, y, 1720935, 182, 123, 109, 130))then
NEXT PART--------->>>>>>
add a 'movemouse’in there so it actually clicks------>>>>

so…so far we have----->

if(FindColor(x, y, 123893, 198, 45, 160, 130))then
Movemouse(x, y);

LAST PART-----> add ClickMouse------->

so------

if(FindColor(x, y, 123489, 123, 129, 83, 132))then
Movemouse(x, y);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);

Congratulations! (rest of your script seemed fine—>just change this bit(numbers i used i made up—use real numbers lol :))

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with a script?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

if (findcolor(x,y,1720935,0,0,0,0))

This line basically says find the color 1720935 in the rectangle with the coordinates 0,0,0,0. Obviously, it won’t click because that rectangle doesn’t exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with a script?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I made a script, select the rs client, click run and it’s all fine.
But nothing clicks!
Here is my script:

[code]program killscorpion;

var x,y:integer;

procedure click;
begin
if (findcolor(x,y,1720935,0,0,0,0)) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
end;

begin
repeat
wait(2000)
click;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
